# inputText(_:client:)

**Instance Method**

Handles key down events that do not map to an action method.

## Declaration

```swift
func inputText(_ string: String!, client sender: Any!) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **string**: The key down event, which is the text input by the client.
- **sender**: The client object sending the key down events.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/YES] if the input is accepted; otherwise [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NO].

## Discussion

An input method should implement this method when using key binding (that is, it implements [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/didCommand(by:client:)]).
